text: "Indo Silver Club" is a single by French electronic music duo Daft Punk."Indo Silver Club" at Discogs. Retrieved 16 April 2017."Indo Silver Club (Part One" at Daft Punk Anthology Retrieved 16 April 2017. It was released as a 12-inch single on 26 February 1996 by Soma Quality Recordings with no artist listed on the record. "Indo Silver Club" (Part Two) was later released as the 14th track on their debut album Homework in 1997."Homework" at Discogs == Composition == Both parts of "Indo Silver Club" are house tracks, and are composed of samples with a drum beat."Indo Silver Club (Part One)" on YouTube Retrieved 16 April 2017."Indo Silver Club" on YouTube Retrieved 16 April 2017. The second part uses samples from Karen Young's 1978 disco hit "Hot Shot". ==Track listing== *12-inch record track listing #"Indo Silver Club" (Part One) – 3:53 #"Indo Silver Club" (Part Two) – 4:37 ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:1996 singles Category:Daft Punk songs Category:Songs written by Thomas Bangalter Category:Songs written by Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo
title: Indo Silver Club
